alert.note: Alert for Adams; Crawford; Grant; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Richland; Trempealeau; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 3:27AM CDT until September 03 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Critical Fire Conditions This Afternoon for Parts of Wisconsin... .The combination of record hot temperatures, low relative humidity, southwest winds of 10 to 15 mph gusting to 25 mph at times, and dry vegetation will result in very conducive conditions for fires to become unmanageable this afternoon into the early evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS OVER WEST, SOUTHWEST, AND CENTRAL WISCONSIN... The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a Red Flag Warning for critical fire weather conditions, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...In Wisconsin, Trempealeau, Jackson, La Crosse, Monroe, Juneau, Adams, Vernon, Crawford, Richland and Grant. * TIMING...This afternoon into the early evening. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Afternoon high temperatures will reach 95 to 101 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start could spread rapidly and become hard to control. Please heed any local burning bands.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Crawford; Grant; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Richland; Trempealeau; Vernon
